# BoothsAlgorithm
A C programming language implementation of Boothâ€™s Signed Multiplication Algorithm.

### Input
```plaintext
5
10
0110101101 1100011001
4
0110 1101
6
110110 100101
8
11001111 11001100
8
00001111 00001111
```

### Output
```plaintext

Multiply 0110101101 and 1100011001

Product              Q-1 M          -M         Log
00000000001100011001  0  0110101101 1001010011 Populate Data
10010100111100011001  0  0110101101 1001010011 A = A - M
11001010011110001100  1  0110101101 1001010011 Shift
00110101101110001100  1  0110101101 1001010011 A = A + M
00011010110111000110  0  0110101101 1001010011 Shift
00001101011011100011  0  0110101101 1001010011 Shift
10100010001011100011  0  0110101101 1001010011 A = A - M
11010001000101110001  1  0110101101 1001010011 Shift
11101000100010111000  1  0110101101 1001010011 Shift
01010011110010111000  1  0110101101 1001010011 A = A + M
00101001111001011100  0  0110101101 1001010011 Shift
00010100111100101110  0  0110101101 1001010011 Shift
00001010011110010111  0  0110101101 1001010011 Shift
10011111001110010111  0  0110101101 1001010011 A = A - M
11001111100111001011  1  0110101101 1001010011 Shift
11100111110011100101  1  0110101101 1001010011 Shift

0110101101 * 1100011001 = 11100111110011100101
429 * -231 = -99099


Multiply 0110 and 1101

Product  Q-1 M    -M   Log
00001101  0  0110 1010 Populate Data
10101101  0  0110 1010 A = A - M
11010110  1  0110 1010 Shift
00110110  1  0110 1010 A = A + M
00011011  0  0110 1010 Shift
10111011  0  0110 1010 A = A - M
11011101  1  0110 1010 Shift
11101110  1  0110 1010 Shift

0110 * 1101 = 11101110
6 * -3 = -18


Multiply 110110 and 100101

Product      Q-1 M      -M     Log
000000100101  0  110110 001010 Populate Data
001010100101  0  110110 001010 A = A - M
000101010010  1  110110 001010 Shift
111011010010  1  110110 001010 A = A + M
111101101001  0  110110 001010 Shift
000111101001  0  110110 001010 A = A - M
000011110100  1  110110 001010 Shift
111001110100  1  110110 001010 A = A + M
111100111010  0  110110 001010 Shift
111110011101  0  110110 001010 Shift
001000011101  0  110110 001010 A = A - M
000100001110  1  110110 001010 Shift

110110 * 100101 = 000100001110
-10 * -27 = 270


Multiply 11001111 and 11001100

Product          Q-1 M        -M       Log
0000000011001100  0  11001111 00110001 Populate Data
0000000001100110  0  11001111 00110001 Shift
0000000000110011  0  11001111 00110001 Shift
0011000100110011  0  11001111 00110001 A = A - M
0001100010011001  1  11001111 00110001 Shift
0000110001001100  1  11001111 00110001 Shift
1101101101001100  1  11001111 00110001 A = A + M
1110110110100110  0  11001111 00110001 Shift
1111011011010011  0  11001111 00110001 Shift
0010011111010011  0  11001111 00110001 A = A - M
0001001111101001  1  11001111 00110001 Shift
0000100111110100  1  11001111 00110001 Shift

11001111 * 11001100 = 0000100111110100
-49 * -52 = 2548


Multiply 00001111 and 00001111

Product          Q-1 M        -M       Log
0000000000001111  0  00001111 11110001 Populate Data
1111000100001111  0  00001111 11110001 A = A - M
1111100010000111  1  00001111 11110001 Shift
1111110001000011  1  00001111 11110001 Shift
1111111000100001  1  00001111 11110001 Shift
1111111100010000  1  00001111 11110001 Shift

0000011100001000  0  00001111 11110001 Shift
0000001110000100  0  00001111 11110001 Shift
0000000111000010  0  00001111 11110001 Shift

00001111 * 00001111 = 0000000011100001
15 * 15 = 225
```
